ygData.subject: Instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Friends, A new item was brought to my attention by a fellow bard in Freeport a few days ago. A lute tuner (I forget the exact item name), is now sold by
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Friends,

A new item was brought to my attention by a fellow bard in Freeport a few
days ago. A lute tuner (I forget the exact item name), is now sold by the
vendor inside the guild. It looks like a lute. I had previously found an npc
in Firiona Vie who sells 2 parts of a lute and 2 parts of a flute. This is
like the trumpet parts that are sold, I think in EC or N Ro. I have never
heard of anyone that knows how to assemble these pieces. I hail'ed all the
bards in the FP guild with predicatable results, only the mail quest. I
wonder if these things can be crafted via a trade skill or are for quests.

The latest newbie beg: I have gotten tells twice now from bards under L10
asking if I would mind getting them a set of lambent armor. That would be
taking generosity to new heights.

L51! woohoo travel song is fun, but pulling with it even sung kills pets.

Lady Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Knight Marshall, Order of the Rose
Excalibur, Xegony
